column1: Ichchapuram is a town in Srikakulam district of the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh. It is a Municipality and also the mandal headquarters of Ichapuram mandal.this town is located nearly 142 km from the district capital srikakulam.

Ichchapuram is located at the border of Andhra Pradesh and Odisha at 19.12°N 84.7°E﻿ / 19.12; 84.7. It has an average elevation of 7 metres (22 feet). The town is located on the banks of Bahuda river.
